item.title: Tentative: [Phonetic Description of Khroskyabs]
item.description: This is an early sketch of an Yu Lha’s home variety. Our goal is to model an Illustration of the IPA.

item.title: Automatic Speech Recognition
item.description:
Currently I am working with easy to get speech data. This includes a Language of Nepal, a language of Nigeria and a language of Tanzania.

Tools I use or have found interesting are:

  • Epitran - A tool for transcribing orthographic text as IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet)

item.title: Copyright and the distributed lexicon
item.description:
Citeable as

Hugh Paterson III. 2019. Copyright and the Distributed Lexicon. Presentation at the 6th International Conference on Language Documentation & Conservation (ICLDC), Connecting Communities, Languages & Technology, February 28-March 3, 2019, at the Hawaiʻi Imin International Conference Center on the campus of the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. ​

item.title: Business Maturity Canvas
item.description:
This project was a colaboration with Steve Moitiozo. He generally has the conversations, and therefore provided the content fodder. I facilitated graphical design of these ideas. I provided the cavas layout and graphic design.

The project resulted in two tools. A canvas which helps a business “owner” or and entrepreneur discover where their bussiness is currently and what sorts of actions they should be looking at to determin how their business fits into the market. * Canvas * Worksheet

item.title: The Death of Victor Hugos
item.description: This version is only viewable by invite only until formally published.

item.title: Tone in Whispered Speech Bibliography
item.description: This is a short non-exhaustive bibliography of instigations and their reports when looking at tone in whispered speech. Citations are kept in a GitHub gist. Comments are welcome via GitHub.
